title: 4 Monoprotic acids - particle diagram of sample 1

content.question: Which particle drawing best represents a portion of sample <math alttext="1" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math>? (Note that water molecules are omitted.)

choices.label: The figure shows a particle drawing with one A with a negative 1 charge ion, one H 3 O with a positive 1 charge ion, and three H A molecules.
The figure shows a particle drawing with four A with a negative 1 charge ions and four H 3 O with a positive 1 charge ions.
The figure shows a particle drawing with four H A molecules.
The figure shows a particle drawing with two A with a negative 1 charge ions, two H 3 O with a positive 1 charge ions and two H A molecules.

content.answer: The figure shows a particle drawing with four A with a negative 1 charge ions and four H 3 O with a positive 1 charge ions.

skill.text: 4.C: Explain the connection between particulate-level and macroscopic properties of a substance using models and representations.
